lead_paragraph: The Tampa Bay Lightning signed left wing Ryan Malone to a seven-year contract. Malone was acquired from Pittsburgh last weekend along with Gary Roberts for a conditional draft pick in 2009. Malone played in 77 games with the Penguins last season, scoring 27 goals and finishing with 51 points. Roberts signed a one-year deal with Tampa Bay.
